entry.title: Why I Decided to Write a Blog
entry.content:
It seems that all the programmers around me have their own blogs, while I am not
the kind of people who want to share one’s own life with strangers. I can write down my
sadness and happiness in my journal. The technical knowledge is kept neatly in my
Onenote (I won’t use Evernote until it can highlight the code block).

But today when I was reading the article prolog, it hit me that it’s
time to have my own blog which shares interesting things. It is not a place to
show how learned I am, but where I can be heared by the world.

I am just like a child who finds the most wonderful shells on the beach and wants
to show it to the whole world.
entry.summary:
